localised_text.last_approved_text: China is in turmoil. The great empire of the Han, stretching back ages beyond counting, is being devoured by corruption. The Yellow Turbans, thousands strong, began raising their banners in rebellion and seizing commanderies across the realm. In response, generals loyal to the emperor rose up and put down the rebellion.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: China is in turmoil. The great empire of the Han, stretching back ages beyond counting, is being devoured by corruption. The Yellow Turbans, thousands strong, began raising their banners in rebellion and seizing commanderies across the realm. In response, generals loyal to the emperor rose up and put down the rebellion.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/29 - Dong Zhuo Goes to War.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet despite the victory, the chaos only grew. With the corruption at the very heart of the empire, the loyal generals stormed the Imperial palace and killed the Ten Eunuchs, the source of China's ills. In the madness, the warlord Dong Zhuo seized the emperor. With the great warrior Lü Bu at his side, none dared oppose him.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Yet despite the victory, the chaos only grew. With the corruption at the very heart of the empire, the loyal generals stormed the Imperial palace and killed the Ten Eunuchs, the source of China's ills. In the madness, the warlord Dong Zhuo seized the emperor. With the great warrior Lü Bu at his side, none dared oppose him.

localised_text.last_approved_text: In response to Dong Zhuo's brazen display - treason, some call it - a coalition of warlords rose up, led by the charismatic Yuan Shao, to save the Han. Faced with united opposition, Dong Zhuo retreated west to his stronghold of Chang'an, razing the old capital, Luoyang, to the ground as he fled.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: In response to Dong Zhuo's brazen display - treason, some call it - a coalition of warlords rose up, led by the charismatic Yuan Shao, to save the Han. Faced with united opposition, Dong Zhuo retreated west to his stronghold of Chang'an, razing the old capital, Luoyang, to the ground as he fled.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/09 - Character Death - Your Faction - Character Natural .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: It is now the year 190 CE, and the coalition has all-but collapsed. Warlords on all sides have seen opportunities to build their own fortunes from the chaos. Yellow Turban remnants still stalk the lands, seeking the age of the Yellow Sky, whilst Soldiers of Fortune feel the change of fate on the wind and strike out on their own. The scales shift, and China hangs in the balance...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: It is now the year 190 CE, and the coalition has all-but collapsed. Warlords on all sides have seen opportunities to build their own fortunes from the chaos. Yellow Turban remnants still stalk the lands, seeking the age of the Yellow Sky, whilst Soldiers of Fortune feel the change of fate on the wind and strike out on their own. The scales shift, and China hangs in the balance...

localised_text.last_approved_text: The worm will forever be caught by the bird, and the weak will forever be consumed by the mighty. Another faction has submitted themselves, all but completely, to the dominance of another. In this subjugation they may know peace, but they will most certainly never know freedom.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The worm will forever be caught by the bird, and the weak will forever be consumed by the mighty. Another faction has submitted themselves, all but completely, to the dominance of another. In this subjugation they may know peace, but they will most certainly never know freedom.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Life is fleeting, as is victory. In these chaotic times, only the strongest can survive the storm that ravages China. The weak are not so fortunate; outmanoeuvred and isolated, a faction was crushed into oblivion. But the phoenix may ever return from the cinders...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Life is fleeting, as is victory. In these chaotic times, only the strongest can survive the storm that ravages China. The weak are not so fortunate; outmanoeuvred and isolated, a faction was crushed into oblivion. But the phoenix may ever return from the cinders...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even from the ashes of death, a phoenix may rise to new life. Across China, kingdoms live and die as the seasons pass, only to return once again. A faction has emerged amongst the chaos; will they be friend or foe?

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Even from the ashes of death, a phoenix may rise to new life. Across China, kingdoms live and die as the seasons pass, only to return once again. A faction has emerged amongst the chaos; will they be friend or foe?

localised_text.last_approved_text: War is an open flame; The longer it continues, the more the country is starved, but the fire burns all the more fiercely for it. Another faction has been drawn into the conflict, bringing their arms to bear in the name of what they feel is right.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: War is an open flame; The longer it continues, the more the country is starved, but the fire burns all the more fiercely for it. Another faction has been drawn into the conflict, bringing their arms to bear in the name of what they feel is right.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A calming breeze has long caressed your lands, bringing stability and enduring peace. You must make certain that this time of union and order is not squandered, for although the breeze blows calmly and peacefully for now, tempestuous winds are ever an unpredictable malice.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: A calming breeze has long caressed your lands, bringing stability and enduring peace. You must make certain that this time of union and order is not squandered, for although the breeze blows calmly and peacefully for now, tempestuous winds are ever an unpredictable malice.

localised_text.last_approved_text: War has long ravaged your lands, taking its toll on your people. Languishing under the oppression of fear can only last so long. The people, having tasted the sweetness of freedom before, will clamour for it again - sometimes violently!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: War has long ravaged your lands, taking its toll on your people. Languishing under the oppression of fear can only last so long. The people, having tasted the sweetness of freedom before, will clamour for it again - sometimes violently!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Just as the whirlwind cannot outlast the rising dawn, war will always yield to peace in the end. Your lands once more know the calm and quiet that comes with the cessation of hostilities. Now is the time to look inward; build, grow, prosper!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Just as the whirlwind cannot outlast the rising dawn, war will always yield to peace in the end. Your lands once more know the calm and quiet that comes with the cessation of hostilities. Now is the time to look inward; build, grow, prosper!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wise is the man who embraces unity over destruction, bringing an end to conflict and allowing for reconciliation. Your people will be glad of the subsiding hostilities, but your battles are not yet over. War still rages, and you must see victory.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Wise is the man who embraces unity over destruction, bringing an end to conflict and allowing for reconciliation. Your people will be glad of the subsiding hostilities, but your battles are not yet over. War still rages, and you must see victory.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Not all things are built to last. Like the tide, all that washes ashore must be reclaimed by the receding waters. Your alliance has collapsed - you must look now to a future without your former ally and find strength in your own courage.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Not all things are built to last. Like the tide, all that washes ashore must be reclaimed by the receding waters. Your alliance has collapsed - you must look now to a future without your former ally and find strength in your own courage.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The strongest bamboo will not break, even under the greatest duress. You have forged a military alliance that aspires to such strength - you must ensure that it holds, like the mighty bamboo, against all enemies who would see it broken!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The strongest bamboo will not break, even under the greatest duress. You have forged a military alliance that aspires to such strength - you must ensure that it holds, like the mighty bamboo, against all enemies who would see it broken!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Through unity and combined effort, great feats can be achieved. This unity becomes an ideal for all of China. You have formed a coalition to combat a growing threat - may your unity hold the people together as one!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Through unity and combined effort, great feats can be achieved. This unity becomes an ideal for all of China. You have formed a coalition to combat a growing threat - may your unity hold the people together as one!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Despite your best efforts, you have submitted yourself to the will of another faction. You will be expected to pay a tithe to your new masters and they alone will dictate the course of your military endeavours. Yet no power can hold you forever. When their weakness shows, an opportunity for liberation may present itself.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Despite your best efforts, you have submitted yourself to the will of another faction. You will be expected to pay a tithe to your new masters and they alone will dictate the course of your military endeavours. Yet no power can hold you forever. When their weakness shows, an opportunity for liberation may present itself.

localised_text.last_approved_text: China can be ruled by only one; so the Mandate of Heaven passes. Some usurper has tried to claim it and declare themselves emperor. Though they have strength, they do not speak honestly. They must be deposed, if you are to ascend as China's champion!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: China can be ruled by only one; so the Mandate of Heaven passes. Some usurper has tried to claim it and declare themselves emperor. Though they have strength, they do not speak honestly. They must be deposed, if you are to ascend as China's champion!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/14 - Emperor - Other Faction - Emperor Declared Variation.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Another has seen fit to try and usurp your rightful position, claiming that they have the Mandate of Heaven. Though they call themselves emperor, they are no more than a pretender to the throne - you must hold fast against these insults, and take war to these traitors!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Another has seen fit to try and usurp your rightful position, claiming that they have the Mandate of Heaven. Though they call themselves emperor, they are no more than a pretender to the throne - you must hold fast against these insults, and take war to these traitors!

localised_text.last_approved_text: As the dawn must follow the terrible night, you have declared yourself emperor, ushering in the beginnings of the Yellow Sky; may it soon push out the grey darkness of old and herald a new dynasty - a righteous dynasty!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: As the dawn must follow the terrible night, you have declared yourself emperor, ushering in the beginnings of the Yellow Sky; may it soon push out the grey darkness of old and herald a new dynasty - a righteous dynasty!

localised_text.last_approved_text: China is consumed by would-be emperors and their myriad claims to power. Yet they are inheritors of the illegitimate Han; only you have just cause, and the backing of heaven, to become a new, pure emperor.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: China is consumed by would-be emperors and their myriad claims to power. Yet they are inheritors of the illegitimate Han; only you have just cause, and the backing of heaven, to become a new, pure emperor.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/15 - Emperor - Your Faction - Emperor Declared.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Heavenly Mandate has passed to you, at least so you would believe. In declaring yourself emperor, all of China may gaze upon you and judge you accordingly. It lies heavy on you, then, to prove that the will of heaven is truly yours.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The Heavenly Mandate has passed to you, at least so you would believe. In declaring yourself emperor, all of China may gaze upon you and judge you accordingly. It lies heavy on you, then, to prove that the will of heaven is truly yours.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/05 - Character Death - Your Faction - Above Rank 10 .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: The mark of a great leader of men is not how many battles they win, but how long they survive. An enemy general has fallen - time and luck sealed their fate, and so too have dealt a blow to their cause. Do not squander this opportunity to strike!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The mark of a great leader of men is not how many battles they win, but how long they survive. An enemy general has fallen - time and luck sealed their fate, and so too have dealt a blow to their cause. Do not squander this opportunity to strike!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/06 - Character Death - Enemy Faction - Faction Leader.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: The leader of one of your enemies has fallen! Though another will inevitably assume their position, their death is nevertheless a blow - you should capitalise on their vulnerability and strike before they are able to recover their strength.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The leader of one of your enemies has fallen! Though another will inevitably assume their position, their death is nevertheless a blow - you should capitalise on their vulnerability and strike before they are able to recover their strength.

localised_text.last_approved_text: New generations blossom from the labours of their forebears. Life springs eternal, and infinite wisdom and effort has given way to the renewal of life - a birth in your family, and the continuation of your lineage!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: New generations blossom from the labours of their forebears. Life springs eternal, and infinite wisdom and effort has given way to the renewal of life - a birth in your family, and the continuation of your lineage!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/09 - Character Death - Your Faction - Character Natural .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Death is not to be feared, but embraced as the journey's natural end. Like nature, all things rise and return. Your comrade, having lived a long and worthy life, has died. Now he embraces eternity, and finds enlightenment beyond this world.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Death is not to be feared, but embraced as the journey's natural end. Like nature, all things rise and return. Your comrade, having lived a long and worthy life, has died. Now he embraces eternity, and finds enlightenment beyond this world.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/05 - Character Death - Your Faction - Above Rank 10 .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even the mightiest of trees succumbs eventually to time, or the axe. Your esteemed general, after many victories and endeavours, has fallen. Yet their legacy will persist; the wind will carry their name long after it stops being spoken.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Even the mightiest of trees succumbs eventually to time, or the axe. Your esteemed general, after many victories and endeavours, has fallen. Yet their legacy will persist; the wind will carry their name long after it stops being spoken.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/10 - Character Death - Your Faction - Your Faction - Character Dies Suspicious .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: At the heart of all things is truth, yet truth is often unfathomable and obscured. The sudden death of your comrade is not without doubt, though no tangible evidence exists. Yet this abstraction only leads to greater suspicion of foul play…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: At the heart of all things is truth, yet truth is often unfathomable and obscured. The sudden death of your comrade is not without doubt, though no tangible evidence exists. Yet this abstraction only leads to greater suspicion of foul play…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/08 - Character Death - Dong Zhuo - Character Executed .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: The brutality of the cruel tyrant, Dong Zhuo, knows no bounds. In his capricious barbarity, he has executed your comrade. What he lacks in mercy, he makes up for with pure malice! May justice soon come to this dark and twisted soul…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The brutality of the cruel tyrant, Dong Zhuo, knows no bounds. In his capricious barbarity, he has executed your comrade. What he lacks in mercy, he makes up for with pure malice! May justice soon come to this dark and twisted soul…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/07 - Character Death - Your Faction - Character Executed .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Though they fought bravely, your general was defeated and captured after a hard-fought battle. Rather than show clemency, their captors chose to execute them. The axe is callous and indiscriminate, but you must let vengeance drive you to victory in their name!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Though they fought bravely, your general was defeated and captured after a hard-fought battle. Rather than show clemency, their captors chose to execute them. The axe is callous and indiscriminate, but you must let vengeance drive you to victory in their name!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/06 - Character Death - Enemy Faction - Faction Leader.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: As one falls, another must rise to take its place. You are ascendant now, standing to assume the place of your fallen leader; you are embodied with their ideals and their very purpose. Strike out, in the name of China and of vengeance - make your mark!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: As one falls, another must rise to take its place. You are ascendant now, standing to assume the place of your fallen leader; you are embodied with their ideals and their very purpose. Strike out, in the name of China and of vengeance - make your mark!

localised_text.last_approved_text: You have suffered an injury that, whilst not fatal, will require you to rest and recuperate. Your immediate future will be absent of battles and glory, but there is still much important work to do directing your grand strategies across China.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: You have suffered an injury that, whilst not fatal, will require you to rest and recuperate. Your immediate future will be absent of battles and glory, but there is still much important work to do directing your grand strategies across China.

localised_text.last_approved_text: From the branches, seeds fall, find safe and fertile ground, then grow anew. The seeds of marriage are sprouted. A union between two families in matrimony can only strengthen bonds.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: From the branches, seeds fall, find safe and fertile ground, then grow anew. The seeds of marriage are sprouted. A union between two families in matrimony can only strengthen bonds.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even the strongest of warriors cannot deflect every blade sent their way. One of your generals has suffered a wound. It is not grievous, but will take time to heal - your general will remain out of action until he has recovered.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Even the strongest of warriors cannot deflect every blade sent their way. One of your generals has suffered a wound. It is not grievous, but will take time to heal - your general will remain out of action until he has recovered.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Like a field bereft of grain, the administration suffers from a lack of funding. Nothing will grow without seed - even in the greatest of soil, stagnation and decay loom. The populace, slighted by worsening poverty, may even consider civil disobedience…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Like a field bereft of grain, the administration suffers from a lack of funding. Nothing will grow without seed - even in the greatest of soil, stagnation and decay loom. The populace, slighted by worsening poverty, may even consider civil disobedience…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/25 - Spies - Spy Becomes Court Noble.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your council has delivered to you their requests - a list of assignments they strongly recommend you pursue. Your generals are crucial to your success, and their petitions are not all without merit. A seed cannot grow in barren soil, and so it falls to you to nurture the field.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Your council has delivered to you their requests - a list of assignments they strongly recommend you pursue. Your generals are crucial to your success, and their petitions are not all without merit. A seed cannot grow in barren soil, and so it falls to you to nurture the field.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/09 - Character Death - Your Faction - Character Natural .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Another warrior has joined your efforts! Take care that they are treated fairly and with respect, else their zeal for your cause will sour into disappointment and resentment. A neglected plant may wither and die, but may also poison the soil around it. Be mindful...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Another warrior has joined your efforts! Take care that they are treated fairly and with respect, else their zeal for your cause will sour into disappointment and resentment. A neglected plant may wither and die, but may also poison the soil around it. Be mindful...

localised_text.last_approved_text: The powerful will always fight one another, but the truly devious will find ways to have others fight for them. War has bloomed anew, yet the true puppet masters prowl in the shadows, observing events and manipulating them for their own purposes.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The powerful will always fight one another, but the truly devious will find ways to have others fight for them. War has bloomed anew, yet the true puppet masters prowl in the shadows, observing events and manipulating them for their own purposes.

localised_text.last_approved_text: "Existence and nonexistence are incompatible, the difficult and the easy are mutually opposed." Everything in balance; light is defined by darkness, good by bad. You have taken the first potent steps to understanding this harmony.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: "Existence and nonexistence are incompatible, the difficult and the easy are mutually opposed." Everything in balance; light is defined by darkness, good by bad. You have taken the first potent steps to understanding this harmony.

localised_text.last_approved_text: You have taken your first steps into a much larger world. China is changing, and it takes only the slightest breeze to send a petal into the air; where will this wind of change take you?

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: You have taken your first steps into a much larger world. China is changing, and it takes only the slightest breeze to send a petal into the air; where will this wind of change take you?

localised_text.last_approved_text: "The wise man, trusting in goodness, always saves men." You have continued to grow in understanding, recognising that China and its people must be healed, and you must be the physician.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: "The wise man, trusting in goodness, always saves men." You have continued to grow in understanding, recognising that China and its people must be healed, and you must be the physician.

localised_text.last_approved_text: You continue to ascend on the rising wind, gathering titles and honours as you amass power. The wind of change howls now as a growing storm; you must continue to guide its path.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: You continue to ascend on the rising wind, gathering titles and honours as you amass power. The wind of change howls now as a growing storm; you must continue to guide its path.

localised_text.last_approved_text: "Nothing is gentler than water, yet nothing can withstand its force." Power lies in paradox - the quietest often affect the greatest change. You are empowered by your new-found understanding - apply it for China's benefit!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: "Nothing is gentler than water, yet nothing can withstand its force." Power lies in paradox - the quietest often affect the greatest change. You are empowered by your new-found understanding - apply it for China's benefit!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The petals that once clung to the branch are now powerless before the might of your tempest. The old ways are in turmoil, and must be steadied. Though others bar your path, forge on! Your destiny is all of China's!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The petals that once clung to the branch are now powerless before the might of your tempest. The old ways are in turmoil, and must be steadied. Though others bar your path, forge on! Your destiny is all of China's!

localised_text.last_approved_text: "Those who fight do not win; those who win do not fight. This is the way of the Tao." You continue to grow and unlock the mysteries of the Tao - now you must apply these learnings for the peace of the people.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: "Those who fight do not win; those who win do not fight. This is the way of the Tao." You continue to grow and unlock the mysteries of the Tao - now you must apply these learnings for the peace of the people.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The old ways have died; the Will of Heaven abandoned them. The time has come for a new emperor to lead the people, and you have made your claim. You are as the hurricane now - you must prove that you can rule the Celestial Empire!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The old ways have died; the Will of Heaven abandoned them. The time has come for a new emperor to lead the people, and you have made your claim. You are as the hurricane now - you must prove that you can rule the Celestial Empire!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Peace can only be achieved with greater understanding. China's chaos is a reflection of heaven's discord. Cosmic balance must be restored through diligent work towards harmony. With each passing day, we grow closer to China's unity.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Peace can only be achieved with greater understanding. China's chaos is a reflection of heaven's discord. Cosmic balance must be restored through diligent work towards harmony. With each passing day, we grow closer to China's unity.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/26 - Spies - Spy Becomes Faction Heir.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Only through adaptation and consideration will we see to China grow. The old systems of government must not be lost in the chaos; their reforms will inspire us to greatness, as a tree must be nurtured, even during drought...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Only through adaptation and consideration will we see to China grow. The old systems of government must not be lost in the chaos; their reforms will inspire us to greatness, as a tree must be nurtured, even during drought...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Like an unattended sickness, corruption will only grow if left without treatment. As your power grows, the shadow of misconduct grows too. This corruption was all-but fatal to the Han; it must be rooted out and fought!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Like an unattended sickness, corruption will only grow if left without treatment. As your power grows, the shadow of misconduct grows too. This corruption was all-but fatal to the Han; it must be rooted out and fought!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A leader has many mouths to feed, and the able one will provide for them all. Food supplies are beginning to vanish in your regions - steps must be taken to address the situation, for a ruler of corpses is no ruler at all…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: A leader has many mouths to feed, and the able one will provide for them all. Food supplies are beginning to vanish in your regions - steps must be taken to address the situation, for a ruler of corpses is no ruler at all…

localised_text.last_approved_text: When the farmer cannot feed himself, he cannot be expected to feed a nation. Your supplies of food have run dry and despair grips your people. You must take immediate steps to provide for your starving populace, or they will take matters into their own hands...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: When the farmer cannot feed himself, he cannot be expected to feed a nation. Your supplies of food have run dry and despair grips your people. You must take immediate steps to provide for your starving populace, or they will take matters into their own hands...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Though you have fought hard to liberate the people, change can come too suddenly. The people, unused to such seismic shifts, clamour for their old oppressors, violently rejecting your righteous liberation.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Though you have fought hard to liberate the people, change can come too suddenly. The people, unused to such seismic shifts, clamour for their old oppressors, violently rejecting your righteous liberation.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Respect begets loyalty; fear harbours revolt. Inattentive leadership leads to disdain, to anger, then to revolution. You must regain control of your populace - first through subjugation, then through wise leadership.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Respect begets loyalty; fear harbours revolt. Inattentive leadership leads to disdain, to anger, then to revolution. You must regain control of your populace - first through subjugation, then through wise leadership.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your spy's ascent continues, as they further ingratiate themselves amongst the enemy. Though their rise is impressive, watch them with caution, for the overtures of their targets may turn into the honeyed words of their allies, should their resolve waver.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Your spy's ascent continues, as they further ingratiate themselves amongst the enemy. Though their rise is impressive, watch them with caution, for the overtures of their targets may turn into the honeyed words of their allies, should their resolve waver.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/25 - Spies - Spy Becomes Court Noble.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Subterfuge and deception are powerful elements in warfare; the shadows hide all manner of realities. Your spy has infiltrated the enemy's ranks, and may now begin their work. Expect more information from them, at their convenience...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Subterfuge and deception are powerful elements in warfare; the shadows hide all manner of realities. Your spy has infiltrated the enemy's ranks, and may now begin their work. Expect more information from them, at their convenience...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/26 - Spies - Spy Becomes Faction Heir.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: From such small beginnings, your spy has risen almost to the very apex of their potential. They have become so beloved that power over the entire faction is but a death away. Should the leader die, they will become the next one and so - if they remain loyal - will you...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: From such small beginnings, your spy has risen almost to the very apex of their potential. They have become so beloved that power over the entire faction is but a death away. Should the leader die, they will become the next one and so - if they remain loyal - will you...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/28 - Spies - Spy becomes Faction Leader.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: The will of man is manifest in your spy's rise to supremacy. They are now heralded as leader, having outlasted or deposed all others in their way. If their loyalty to you does not falter now, then this will spell glad tidings for all of China...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The will of man is manifest in your spy's rise to supremacy. They are now heralded as leader, having outlasted or deposed all others in their way. If their loyalty to you does not falter now, then this will spell glad tidings for all of China...

localised_text.last_approved_text: From their place at your enemy's side, your spy has earned a position of some trust. They have been given command of a retinue; entrusted with crucial forces in the enemy's war. Should your spy's loyalty be without question, then your enemy has left themselves exposed.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: From their place at your enemy's side, your spy has earned a position of some trust. They have been given command of a retinue; entrusted with crucial forces in the enemy's war. Should your spy's loyalty be without question, then your enemy has left themselves exposed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Through duplicitous words and careful action, your spy has reached a position of trust with your enemy. They have been assigned governorship of a region, and are responsible for the administration of a portion of your enemy's kingdom. Providing they do not find their new position too much to their liking, this could work in your favour.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Through duplicitous words and careful action, your spy has reached a position of trust with your enemy. They have been assigned governorship of a region, and are responsible for the administration of a portion of your enemy's kingdom. Providing they do not find their new position too much to their liking, this could work in your favour.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/10 - Character Death - Your Faction - Your Faction - Character Dies Suspicious .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Action without victory leaves a bitter taste, yet it is better than no action at all. Despite the best efforts, an assignment has resulted in failure. Yet diligence may yield victory in the future, though for now caution may be wiser…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Action without victory leaves a bitter taste, yet it is better than no action at all. Despite the best efforts, an assignment has resulted in failure. Yet diligence may yield victory in the future, though for now caution may be wiser…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/09 - Character Death - Your Faction - Character Natural .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your spy has proven their worth a hundred times over by succeeding in a most dangerous and difficult task. Through their actions, you have grown stronger and your enemy weaker. Your spy is eager for more assignments; there may be no one else up to the task...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Your spy has proven their worth a hundred times over by succeeding in a most dangerous and difficult task. Through their actions, you have grown stronger and your enemy weaker. Your spy is eager for more assignments; there may be no one else up to the task...

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/01 - At War - Recently Had War Declared .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your foes are ever avaricious, and covetous. They have declared war upon you, and even now advance upon your lands in a brazen display of treachery. You must steel yourself for conflict, for the march of war is relentless.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Your foes are ever avaricious, and covetous. They have declared war upon you, and even now advance upon your lands in a brazen display of treachery. You must steel yourself for conflict, for the march of war is relentless.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If supreme peace is to be achieved, then you must resort to less civil means. War has broken out, and we must fight to see the old ways finally torn down and bring about a new era of lasting harmony.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: If supreme peace is to be achieved, then you must resort to less civil means. War has broken out, and we must fight to see the old ways finally torn down and bring about a new era of lasting harmony.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/01 - At War - Recently Had War Declared .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: You have lit the flames of war, and now the fire rises to consume your enemies. Men will shed their blood in the name of their ideals, and their country. You must make the decisions that will shape destiny!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: You have lit the flames of war, and now the fire rises to consume your enemies. Men will shed their blood in the name of their ideals, and their country. You must make the decisions that will shape destiny!

localised_text.last_approved_text: As the tide rises and falls, so too do the fortunes of warriors. Your army, having confronted a strength far beyond them, has succumbed to oblivion. Naught remains of them now but their broken bodies and inglorious legacy!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: As the tide rises and falls, so too do the fortunes of warriors. Your army, having confronted a strength far beyond them, has succumbed to oblivion. Naught remains of them now but their broken bodies and inglorious legacy!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/04 - War Circumstance - Currently Performing Siege .png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your war has brought you to the very gates of your enemy. Behind their walls, they steel themselves against your armies. They cannot hold out forever, yet an assault may be costly, if not swift. Yet wait too long and reinforcements may arrive to relieve their embattled comrades.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Your war has brought you to the very gates of your enemy. Behind their walls, they steel themselves against your armies. They cannot hold out forever, yet an assault may be costly, if not swift. Yet wait too long and reinforcements may arrive to relieve their embattled comrades.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/03 - War Circumstance - Currently Under Siege.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: The enemy is at your door! Their armies have trapped your forces behind the defensible walls, but this situation cannot hold. If they do not assault the walls, they will starve you out. They must be repelled by force. Your army must be relieved, or all will perish!

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: The enemy is at your door! Their armies have trapped your forces behind the defensible walls, but this situation cannot hold. If they do not assault the walls, they will starve you out. They must be repelled by force. Your army must be relieved, or all will perish!

localised_text.last_approved_text: There are some who wish to reap the spoils of their conquest, and others who seek only to dominate and destroy. A great conflagration has razed an entire settlement. Only rubble remains now, and the marks of dark intent upon the landscape.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: There are some who wish to reap the spoils of their conquest, and others who seek only to dominate and destroy. A great conflagration has razed an entire settlement. Only rubble remains now, and the marks of dark intent upon the landscape.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/02 - War Circumstance - War With 2+ Factions.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your enemies are many, and so the chaos of war spreads ever further. On all fronts, you are beset by conflict. Such endless hostilities cannot be sustained. The people will not suffer overlong with the strain of war upon them, so you must endeavour for forthright victory.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: Your enemies are many, and so the chaos of war spreads ever further. On all fronts, you are beset by conflict. Such endless hostilities cannot be sustained. The people will not suffer overlong with the strain of war upon them, so you must endeavour for forthright victory.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/02 - War Circumstance - War With 2+ Factions.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: War grows bitter and enduring between you and your enemy. If there is no end in sight, then the people will grow weary of the protracted conflict. A swift and decisive end to this matter may be in your best interest…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: War grows bitter and enduring between you and your enemy. If there is no end in sight, then the people will grow weary of the protracted conflict. A swift and decisive end to this matter may be in your best interest…

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.background_image: ui/loading_ui/dynamic/02 - War Circumstance - War With 2+ Factions.png

localised_text.last_approved_text: War is as a great inferno; it cannot be contained, and so spreads and multiplies. On many fronts, you now wage war. Take care not to be overwhelmed by multiple conflicts, and strive towards total victory as soon as possible.

ui_dynamic_loading_screen_events.localised_text: War is as a great inferno; it cannot be contained, and so spreads and multiplies. On many fronts, you now wage war. Take care not to be overwhelmed by multiple conflicts, and strive towards total victory as soon as possible.
